name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience in designing and implementing highly efficient cloud-native infrastructure, leveraging **AWS**, **GCP**, **Terraform**, **Docker**, **Ansible**, **Packer**, **Jenkins**, **Kubernetes**, **Grafana**, and **Prometheus**. Proven track record in automating CI/CD pipelines and managing complex network stacks, ensuring data security and compliance with industry standards. 
Additionally, I possess strong programming skills in **Python** and **Bash**, with proficiency in version control using **Git**. My background also includes developing and maintaining **HTTP APIs** and ensuring seamless integration and deployment of applications. Prior experience in full-stack development enhances my capability to bridge the gap between development and operations, ensuring smooth and efficient execution of DevOps practices.
